errors.generic: The deck could not be loaded because of an unknown error.

The deck could not be loaded because it contains '{#CARDNAME}'.
(Token cards may not be added to decks.)

errors.unsupportedInAutomatic: The deck could not be loaded because it contains '{#CARDNAME}', which is currently unsupported in automatic games.

general.title: General

languageWarnings.incomplete: This language might be incomplete. Click here to help out.
languageWarnings.noRules: The game rules are not available in this language.
languageWarnings.noCards: The cards are not available in this language. English cards will be shown.
languageWarnings.partialCards: Not all cards are available in this language. Missing cards will be in English.

general.autoClosePreview: Close Card Preview When Clicking off of It
general.alwaysShowCardButtons: Show Card Interaction Buttons without Hovering

categories.cardGameDystopia: I'm a Girl?! In this Dystopian Future Ruled by Cards

customization.title: Customization
customization.opponentCardLanguage: Show Opponent Cards in their Language
customization.previewCardLanguage: Also Show Card Preview in that Language
customization.leftField: Place Field on The Left Side of your Screen
customization.mainMenuCards: Show Floating Cards in Main Menu

auto.title: Automatic Games
auto.passOnOnlyOption: Auto-pass when it is the only real option
auto.passInDrawPhase: Pass through draw phase if you have no draw phase specific options or triggers
auto.passInEndPhase: Pass through end phase if you have no end phase specific options or triggers
auto.passOnStackTwo: Pass on empty stacks 2+ if you have no trigger abilities or conditional spells

advanced.title: Advanced
advanced.websocketUrlTitle:
This lets you override the server that is used to establish and proxy game sessions.
If this is not the same as your opponent's you WILL NOT be able to connect.
advanced.cardImageUrlTitle: This lets you override the server that card images are loaded from. This server should be able to provide English and Japanese card images and provide a /random endpoint which redirects to a random card image.
advanced.cardDataApiUrlTitle: This lets you override the API endpoint that is used to query card data. This is used by both the deck creator and the main game.

searchMenu.title: Card Search
searchMenu.textBoxPlaceholder: Search the text box of the card
searchMenu.charactersMouseover: Separate multiple characters with commas. (i.e. Iruyanka, Cheering Angel)

warnings.title: Warnings:
warnings.cardMinimum: A deck must have at least 30 cards.
warnings.cardMaximum: A deck must have at most 50 cards.
warnings.needsUnit: A deck needs to have a unit.
warnings.noTokens: A deck may not contain any Tokens.
warnings.noPartner: To export as .deck, you must select a partner.
warnings.unsupported: Some cards in this deck are unsupported in automatic matches.

customCards.title: Custom Cards
customCards.scriptingExperimentalWarning:
Note: Effect scripting is currently experimental.
That means it is poorly documented and the scripting language might change at any point, potentially breaking your old scripts.
customCards.enterEffectsScripts:
Enter effect scripts here, like so:

o: optional
turnLimit: 1
condition: thisCard.zone = field
cost:
DISCARD(SELECT(1, [from you.hand]))
exec:
opponent.DAMAGE(100)
customCards.noSavedCards: You haven't saved any cards yet.
customCards.unsavedChanges:
You currently have unsaved changes.
If you proceed, those changes will be lost.
customCards.reallyDelete:
Do you really want to delete '{#CARDNAME}'?
This action cannot be undone. '{#CARDNAME}' will be gone forever.
customCards.doesntExist: The selected card doesn't exist anymore and couldn't be loaded.
